name: places/ChIJW1loF-RYwokR4we6jYzoTS4
formattedAddress: 240 E 56th St #2w, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 240 E 56th St #2w, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
Absolutely incredible experience! I have been for many massages in New York and this is definitely the best. Tina was a thorough professional yet kind and cared about the outcome of the massage. She went above and beyond to ensure that I was comfortable and did an exceptional job. I feel like a new person!
As someone that works out regularly, my body has a tendency to be very sore and tight. I don't think I have ever felt more limber! The pricing makes this spot highly attractive! The location was clean and tidy as well!

originalText.text: A great find! I was looking for an affordable massage place, and Brightful Day Spa more than delivered, with great value. The massage was a bit intense, though exactly what I needed. She was able to find and address every single knot, and I’m standing 2 inches taller! I will definitely be back again soon!

text.text: A great find! I was looking for an affordable massage place, and Brightful Day Spa more than delivered, with great value. The massage was a bit intense, though exactly what I needed. She was able to find and address every single knot, and I’m standing 2 inches taller! I will definitely be back again soon!

originalText.text: Had a massage here, it was decent. Paid and tipped 20%, apparently that was not good enough and the lady just started shaking her head and starred me down. She must have forgotten that tip is optional and treating customers badly will not make anyone ever come back or recommend this place.

text.text: Had a massage here, it was decent. Paid and tipped 20%, apparently that was not good enough and the lady just started shaking her head and starred me down. She must have forgotten that tip is optional and treating customers badly will not make anyone ever come back or recommend this place.

originalText.text: Walked in and was quoted $60 for 60 mins, upon check out she opens at the binder and points at 62.50... ok $2.50 more no big deal but why change up prices? And on top of that there is an expected minimum $15 tip even when I said 12. Would not recommend solely due to unethical business practice. The place itself was clean and massage was okay, hence 2 stars.
